stylist.name: Amanda
stylist.title: Owner and Stylist at Luxe Color Lab
stylist.talent: Specializes in color and color correction
stylist.bio: I have been a stylist for 18 years. I worked in Sarasota Florida for 13 years before coming to Charlotte 4 years ago. I have owned my salon, Luxe Color Lab, for over a year and I have began to expand. Color correction and blonding is what I specialize in, but I am also well versed in precision hair cutting.
